PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DistributionPortTypePipe
PropertySetDef.Definition: Pipe port occurrence attributes attached to an instance of IfcDistributionPort.

PropertyDef.Name: ConnectionType
PropertyDef.Definition: The end-style treatment of the duct port:BEADEDSLEEVE: Beaded Sleeve. COMPRESSION: Compression. CRIMP: Crimp. DRAWBAND: Drawband. DRIVESLIP: Drive slip. FLANGED: Flanged. OUTSIDESLEEVE: Outside Sleeve. SLIPON: Slipon. SOLDERED: Soldered. SSLIP: S-Slip. STANDINGSEAM: Standing seam. SWEDGE: Swedge. WELDED: Welded. OTHER: Another type of end-style has been applied. NONE: No end-style has been applied.

PropertyDef.Name: ConnectionSubtype
PropertyDef.Definition: The physical port connection subtype that further qualifies the ConnectionType. The following values are recommended:ACPLUG: A, B, C, D, E, F, EF, G, H, I, J, K, L, M DIN: Mini3P, Mini4P, Mini5P, Mini6P, Mini7P, Mini8P, Mini9P DSub: DA15, DB25, DC37, DD50, DE9, DE15 EIAJ: RC5720 HDMI: A, B, C RADIO: IEEE802.11g, IEEE802.11n RJ: 4P4C, 6P2C, 8P8C SOCKET: E-11, E-12, E-14, E-17, E-26, E-27, E-39, E-40 TRS: TS_Mini, TS_SubMini, TRS_Mini, TRS_SubMini

PropertyDef.Name: NominalDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition:
Nominal diameter or width of the object.
The nominal diameter of the pipe connection.

PropertyDef.Name: InnerDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: The actual inner diameter of the object.

PropertyDef.Name: OuterDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: The actual outer diameter of the object.

PropertyDef.Name: VolumetricFlowRate
PropertyDef.Definition: The volumetric flow rate of the fluid.

PropertyDef.Name: MassFlowRate
PropertyDef.Definition: The mass flow rate of the fluid.

PropertyDef.Name: FlowCondition
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the flow condition as a percentage of the cross-sectional area.
